title: BARA, the Bay Area Robotics Association, launches to accelerate embodied AI
description:
BARA said it intends to connect San Francisco Bay Area investors and startups to shape robotics and embodied AI.

The post BARA, the Bay Area Robotics Association, launches to accelerate embodied AI appeared first on The Robot Report.
